content: “These resolutions are largely symbolic; municipalities have no power to compel Congress to conduct investigations or impeachments.” Ah, but do cities have the power to sue Congress as accessories to Fuhrer Trump’s crimes, I wonder. Then again, with Gorsuch on the Supreme Court, even if Orange Nero does get impeached, Gorsuch will just vote to acquit the sorry bastard. After all, one hand bribes the other, right?
